programme.desc: 500 kilometara dalje od Arktičkog kruga, Cathy i Larry bore se s niskim temperaturama zbog kojih bi mogli ostati bez izvora pitke vode koji im je neophodan za život

programme.title: Lov na oldtajmere
programme.desc: Wayne Carini uvodi gledatelje u svijet prikupljanja vrhunskih automobila. Svjedočite njegovoj vještini otkrivanja skrivenih dragulja i davno zaboravljenih relikvija

programme.title: Autodileri iz Dallasa
programme.desc: Uđite u svijet Teksasa, gdje se glasni ljubitelji automobila okupljaju da bi sudjelovali u iznimno konkurentnom svijetu prevrtanja automobila

programme.title: Skladišni ratovi u Kanadi
Storage Wars Canada
programme.desc: Ursula daje sve od sebe da dobije modni ormar u rodnom gradu Ricka i Cindy. Hoće li se stilovi pokazati bezvremenima i hoće li se njen rizik isplatiti

programme.title: Likvidator
The Liquidator
programme.desc: Cjenkajući se na buvljacima, Schwarz je zaslužio svoje mjesto na vrhu. No jesu li gotovina i ubojite pregovaračke vještine dovoljni da bi zaradio prodajom robe u svom skladištu

programme.title: Trgovci automobilima
Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike u staji pronalazi Porche 914 i usprkos prljavštini odmah vidi da na sportskom automobilu iz '70-ih može zaraditi. Edd napravi generalku i auto je spreman za novog kupca

programme.title: A kako to oni rade?
programme.desc: Doznajte zašto su najnovija zrakoplovna sjedala udobna, sigurna i zabavna, te kako se pomoću zrakoplovne tehnologije dizajniraju grudnjaci koji vam daju taj dodatni "uzgon"

programme.title: Kako se proizvode…
programme.desc: Predmete iz svakodnevnog života stavljamo pod mikroskop da bismo saznali kako se proizvode endoproteze za koljena, lisnate opruge, ulje lavande i zakovice
programme.category: Endoproteze za koljena, lisnate opruge, ulje lavande, zakovice

programme.title: Najgori svjetski…
programme.desc: Pobješnjele oluje i poplave koje proždiru sve pred sobom, ledene pojave i vjetrovi koji su izbrisali cijele gradove. Pogledajte kako nam priroda pokazuje svoju elementarnu snagu

programme.title: Najčudnije na svijetu
World's Strangest
programme.desc: Pridružite se Jasonu Bradburyju koji se koristi znanošću i svjedočenjem očevidaca kako bi istražio čudne, bizarne i apsolutno neobične pojave

programme.title: Upozorili smo vas
programme.desc: Predstavljamo vam super snažne magnete u Engleskoj koji mogu zdrobiti ruku, top kućne izrade iz Nizozemske, te golemu kućnu eksploziju u Norveškoj

programme.title: Brzi i glasni: Teatar razaranja
programme.desc: Pogledajte snimke bespilotne letjelice koja mladoženju udari u lice, pobješnjelog liječnika koji autom proleti kroz trgovinu automobilima i prijatelje koji pale vatromet u kadi

programme.title: Posljednji ratni heroji
Last War Heroes
programme.desc: In the dead of one of the coldest winters on record, under-armed and under-prepared US infantry divisions find themselves fighting off the best of the German army in the inaccessible hill and forest country of the Ardennes

programme.title: Najteži popravci
World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: It's Riley's biggest fix ever! A machine seventeen miles around - worth seven billion dollars! The Large Hadron Collider is the largest atom-smasher ever built - a colossal scientific instrument buried three hundred feet underground, spanning two countries, designed to recreate conditions a billionth of a second after the Big Bang. It could be our key to unlocking the secrets of the universe - except for one tiny thing: it's broken. Nine months ago the world watched as this mother of all atom-smashers almost self-destructed. Now Riley has an exclusive inside view - repairing the final critical component of the Large Hadron Collider and restarting the greatest scientific adventure since we landed a man on the Moon

programme.title: AUTO SOS
Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Mick, who is suffering from osteoporosis, has a much loved Jaguar E-type in his garage. He is too ill to be able to finish the restoration of his car

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Experts examine how scientists are fighting for our survival by battling the world's biggest killer diseases

programme.title: Svjetlost na kraju svijeta
Light At The Edge of The World
programme.desc: Join Wade Davis as he ventures deep into the South American rainforest to explore the depths of an ancient people who have lived for centuries in close harmony with the natural world around them. Wade's mission is to learn from a culture, which may be the last of a lost Amazonian civilization. His hope is to meet the River people and document a ritual never filmed before. In doing so he will see the world through their eyes and try to understand the secrets of their survival

programme.title: Posljednji ratni heroji
Last War Heroes
programme.desc: In the dead of one of the coldest winters on record, under-armed and under-prepared US infantry divisions find themselves fighting off the best of the German army in the inaccessible hill and forest country of the Ardennes

programme.title: Najteži popravci
World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: It's Riley's biggest fix ever! A machine seventeen miles around - worth seven billion dollars! Now Riley has an exclusive inside view - repairing the final critical component of the Large Hadron Collider and restarting the greatest scientific adventure since we landed a man on the Moon

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: Rob has most of his prepper boxes checked: enough food to feed his family for two years, self-made bullets, and a stockpile of weapons. But in order to protect his family from Doomsday marauders, he is devising the ultimate booby-trap system. With the help of a neighbor, Rob is securing his Texas property's perimeter with an elaborate system of alarms, traps and defense mechanisms. But when an unexpected tornado hits, Rob goes into instant prepper mode and booby-trap plans must be put on hold. In Tennessee, Greg is preparing for a national financial catastrophe and plans to spend most of Doomsday in an undisclosed location - an invisible tree house miles from city limits where he hopes to be safe from urban looters. If the build goes as planned, Greg and his family will have a tree house 12 feet into the forest canopy, with mirrored paneling so it reflects the surrounding trees, and a stockpile of food, water and ammo

programme.title: Znanost glupog, ep. 7
Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is the show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded. In this episode Richard Hammond explores the painful potential of knocking down buildings, sledging and abusing airbags

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Experts examine how scientists are fighting for our survival by battling the world's biggest killer diseases

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: We might think our cities of glass, concrete and steel are immune to the dangers of nature. But we're wrong. Wild creatures survive and even thrive in the heart of the city. Among these many species is an exceptional group of twelve - an assembly of mammals, arachnids, and reptiles equipped with an arsenal of predatory and defensive skills and weaponry. Now, witness how they adapt and prosper in a world dominated by humans, hunting on the city streets or altering their behavior to capitalize our presence. Either way, when our paths cross with theirs, the results can be devastating. They're tough, and adaptable, and dangerous-they are The City's Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan: Žive pčele
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore the lives of two different families who fear the end of the world is fast approaching. In Dayton, Texas, John Tucker is preparing for category 5 hurricanes that will change the landscape forever. Around town he is known as the bee man but what people dont know is that John Tucker is planning to use his bees as the ultimate prep. Next, we go inside the lives of two brothers, Bret and Shane. The both live in Utah and do everything together. We follow these brothers as they built the ultimate sniper rifle on a property 5000 feet above sea level all in preparation for an upcoming economic collapse. We join these two families as they prepare for the end of the world, as we know it

programme.title: Autootpad
Strippers: Cars For Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. This week the teams are asked to buy and break a car that cost more than fifty thousand pounds in today's money when it was new. Ben and Frankie decide to go for a touch of class with a Mercedes SL whilst George and Sheldon opt for performance with a BMW M3

programme.title: Autocesta kroz pakao
Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Howie faces a seemingly impossible challenge after a massive wreck spills lumber across a busy highway

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Stephen Hawking and his team investigate how science is on the cusp of making urban living not just a richer experience, but more fun too

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan continues his quest to find and protect the world's largest freshwater fish in the frigid rivers of Mongolia. He will travel by plane, truck, and horseback to find the largest trout known as the Hucho taimen. This is not your everyday dinner trout. This monster can grow up to 6 feet in length and weighs up to 200 pounds

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: Oceans cover two thirds of our planet. These five massive bodies of water create the largest eco system on the planet. The Pacific, Atlantic, Indian, Arctic and Antarctic Oceans contain some of the most dangerous animals on earth. Unique and venomous creatures hunt in tropical waters, while powerful carnivores rule the icy Antarctic. Ideally suited for survival in their ocean environments, twelve elite creatures stand above the pack, armed with keen intellect, ingenious camouflage, venomous fangs and bone-crushing jaws. Whether hunting or defending, their hardcore weaponry should be avoided at all costs! Dive into their world to experience their full, lethal potential -- and see what happens if we get in their way. They're elusive, powerful… and they're dangerous. They are the Ocean's Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Posljednji ratni heroji
Last War Heroes
programme.desc: With only the Rhine River between the Allies and Hitler, each of the Allied armies undertakes to cross the river in its own way. Soldiers tell the amazing story of capturing the Ludendorff Bridge in the town of Remagen. Once across the Rhine, the Allies meet the Soviet troops at Torgau and the war reaches its endgame with the Soviet invasion of Berlin

programme.title: Autootpad
Strippers: Cars For Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. This week the teams are asked to buy and break a car that cost more than fifty thousand pounds in today's money when it was new. Ben and Frankie decide to go for a touch of class with a Mercedes SL whilst George and Sheldon opt for performance with a BMW M3

programme.title: Autocesta kroz pakao
Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Howie faces a seemingly impossible challenge after a massive wreck spills lumber across a busy highway

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga

programme.desc: In this episode, we explore the lives of two different families who fear the end of the world is fast approaching. In Dayton, Texas, John Tucker is preparing for category 5 hurricanes that will change the landscape forever. Around town he is known as the bee man but what people dont know is that John Tucker is planning to use his bees as the ultimate prep. Next, we go inside the lives of two brothers, Bret and Shane. The both live in Utah and do everything together. We follow these brothers as they built the ultimate sniper rifle on a property 5000 feet above sea level all in preparation for an upcoming economic collapse. We join these two families as they prepare for the end of the world, as we know it

programme.title: Znanost glupog, ep. 8
Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is the show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded. In this episode Richard Hammond explores the humiliating and painful potential of karate kicks, urban biking bunny hops and snowboarding on water

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: We explore the lives of two different preppers who fear the end of the world as we know it is fast approaching. In Gun Barrel City, Texas, Kenny is preparing for a civil war. Kenny is building the ultimate fortified rooftop command center to defend his property against marauders. Next, we go inside lives of the Poole family as they build a customized bunker together in preparation for an EMP. We join these two preppers as they prepare for doomsday

programme.title: Brain Games
programme.desc: Through a series of interactive games and experiments, discover the power and the limitations of your logical abilities

programme.title: Brain Games
programme.desc: In this episode about faces, we're going to mess with your mind and show you that there's more to a face than meets the eye

programme.title: Majstor katastrofe
Master of Disaster
programme.desc: Although there has never been a suicide bus bomb blast in the United States, experts agree it could happen in any American city, at anytime. A bus bomb attack is a gruesome scene, not only killing people on the bus but also injuring and killing people outside the bus as well; a terrifying scenario that authorities in the United States want to train for so that they can effectively save as many lives as possible. Join master of disaster Tim Samaras and his team of top scientists as they scientifically re-create the "perfect" terrorist crime scene, analyze their unique blast data and develop ground breaking emergency response plans that could one day, help save lives

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: A look at how breakthroughs in technology are being applied to humans, not only for more effective repairs, but also for upgrading the brain

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: Follow Dr. Zeb Hogan, National Geographic Explorer and an aquatic ecologist on his journey to find the largest freshwater fish in Australia - the freshwater sawfish, a cross between a shark and a chainsaw. These amazing monsters are nearing extinction but here in Northern Australia is a stronghold of this elusive fish

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: What makes the most lethal snake on the entire planet? Is it a bone-crushing grip or venom so potent it can solidify human blood? In Deadliest Snakes, Dr. Brady Barr travels across four continents to crown the world's most fearsome snake. In his quest, Brady comes face-to-face with the Russell's viper, the deadliest snake in all of Asia whose venom can literally dissolve human flesh and veins

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Africas wild spaces host an incredible array of creatures…creatures who engage in a daily ballet of life and death. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of mammals, reptiles and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predator skills. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying into their inner sanctums. From the arid Saharan deserts in the north, to the lush plains of the south, to the expansive Nile River, they creep crawl and live where we live, work, and play. This shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, power and skill surpasses all others. To best understand this animal, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed them to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met them first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Africas Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: India, one of the oldest and culturally rich countries on the planet. Its Its millions of square miles contain six distinct climate zones and sustain nearly a billion people . Living within its arid deserts, lush jungles, and rugged mountains are scores of dangerous species. Among this myriad is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of mammals, reptiles, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory skills. Brilliantly adapted, beautiful to observe, they enthrall and amaze us. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying to their inner sanctums. From the foothills of the Himalayas to the forests of the Sunderbans, Indias deadly dozen creep, crawl, and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. To best understand this animal, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed it to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met it first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Indias Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Dr Zeb Hogan is on a mission in the Indian Himalayas to investigate disturbing reports of a mammoth sized catfish called a Goonch - accused of stalking, attacking and killing people. (This is OK- I've seen this elsewhere, but any Discovery site is not good.) Zeb enlists the help of local guide and conservationist Vinay Badola, and together they head out to investigate the crime scenes along the Kali River. They'll raft through treacherous white water in an area known by locals as 'the Lost Country', where they meet with eye witnesses who give them detailed accounts of the attacks. Zeb then travels to the Ramganga River, the perfect place to spot and catch some Goonch. Commercial fishing is not allowed here so this river could be harbouring some giant fish. (Also- needs a source) His goal is to catch the Goonch and study its behaviour to determine whether these stories are fact or fiction

programme.title: Divlja strana mačaka
programme.desc: Why do cats scratch your furniture? Insist on climbing up curtains and sitting on top of the bookshelf? Why do they rub up against your legs and chatter with their teeth when spying on birds in the yard? A team of cat experts including geneticist Dr. Leslie Lyons, Cat behaviourists Roger Tabor and Mieshelle Nagelschneider, and Kevin Fitzgerald a vet with years of experience treating feline ailments come together to answer the questions that plague cat owners everywhere

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: These are predators whose appetites exceed any sense of self-control. These are the Worlds Deadliest: Hunger Games. Whether its the Burmese python eating every creature in sight in the Florida everglades; the tiger shark gobbling up giant schools of sardines; or the man-eating Tsavo lion terrorizing the African savannah, Hunger Games shows you animals whose diets never say die

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom, females are tough, feisty and fearless. But these lady-killers dont just get by on their good looks; they use their paws, claws and jaws to ensure survival for themselves and their offspring. From the fierce protectiveness of a mama grizzly bear, to the cunning teamwork employed by lady lions this hour of WORLDS DEADLIEST is dedicated to the Lady Killers

programme.title: Divlja Bocvana
programme.desc: As the male heirs of the powerful Xakanaka lions, Tau and Banda's success is not a birthright. When they come of age, like all juvenile males, they are exiled from the pride and must survive as nomads. Cast into the wilderness, they don't know how to hunt. Starvation is a daily threat. Battles with Pride Males teach harsh lessons. Tested to the limit, they must rely on each other. Can they beat the odds and win a kingdom? This is the Game of Prides

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Kenny oversees the construction of a state-of-the-art kennel being built at VLK. But issues with construction are delaying the progress, and Kenny has to light a fire under his crew to complete the kennels in time for the upcoming K9 Olympics. Meanwhile, two members of the Oahu Police Department in Hawaii stop by VLK to pick up a money-detection dog

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: VLK is hosting the 13th annual K-9 Olympics this week. The K-9 Olympics consist of various challenges, searches, and obstacles designed to show the capabilities of the participants dogs. Kenny is hoping to finally be able to relax and enjoy the Olympics this year

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Some you see, and some you don't. But they all have eight legs and a bundle of bulging eyeballs. This is a nightmare of the arachnid kind. So best to look in that shoe before you put it on, because whoever said good things come in small packages, wasn't talking about these guys

programme.title: Krokodil ljudožder
programme.desc: In Africas Croc Attack, American kayakers Ben Stookesberry and Chris Korbulic venture deep into the Congo to track down and capture one of the worlds deadliest predatorsa massive Nile crocodile that killed their friend and guide, Hendri Coetzee

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: It's a goldfish the size of a cow, growing up to 600 lbs and 10 feet long. Giant carp is the angler's holy grail, notoriously difficult to catch and lives in just three Southeast Asia's rivers. It's a bizarre monster with a huge head, big mouth and large shiny scales as big as a baby's hand. National Geographic Explorer and aquatic biologist, Zeb Hogan travels to Thailand and Cambodia where carp are revered and valued but also endangered

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep
programme.desc: Some of Africa's most formidable predators live in family groups. We follow the lives of three of these - lion, wild dog and hyena - as they cross paths in Timbavati, near Kruger. The Timbavati pride is a newly formed coalition of three lion brothers, three lionesses and their newborn cubs. In comparison, the Sohebeles have lost their father and their territory. The 5 youngsters are left to their own devices. We compare the structure of the lions' family group to a pack of wild dogs that visit the Timbavati, and the local hyena clan, lead by a powerful matriarch. All three families work in very different ways with one purpose- survival

programme.title: Divlja Bocvana
programme.desc: As the male heirs of the powerful Xakanaka lions, Tau and Banda's success is not a birthright. programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Nothing like a fun day of frolicking at the beach…but venture past the surf and things could get ugly. For this is where nightmares lurk armed with jaws, posion, and unimaginable powers. They say enter at your own risk...but this time, it just happends to be true

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Some you see, and some you don't. But they all have eight legs and a bundle of bulging eyeballs. This is a nightmare of the arachnid kind. So best to look in that shoe before you put it on, because whoever said good things come in small packages, wasn't talking about these guys

programme.title: Zmije u gradu
programme.desc: Summer is in full swing and snake bounty hunters, Simon and Nadine Keys face the largest Black Mamba theyve ever seen. Simon gets a new tattoo but before its fully healed hes attacked by a spitting cobra. Then, Simon and Nadine both are invited by friends to witness the birth of 15 baby Green Mambas

programme.title: Divlja Bocvana
programme.desc: As the male heirs of the powerful Xakanaka lions, Tau and Banda's success is not a birthright. programme.title: Krokodil ljudožder
programme.desc: In Africas Croc Attack, American kayakers Ben Stookesberry and Chris Korbulic venture deep into the Congo to track down and capture one of the worlds deadliest predatorsa massive Nile crocodile that killed their friend and guide, Hendri Coetzee

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Fish biologist Dr. Zeb Hogan travels to one of the world's most wild and remote locations: Kamchatka, in Russia's Far East, a place home to a mass migration of millions of salmon. It's this isolation that created one of the world's last truly wild salmon sanctuaries and with an incredible 14000 of the most remote and pristine rivers on Earth, it's not surprising that this is the perfect salmon habitat. Zeb wants to explore why there are so many salmon here. To do so he will have to find as many species as he can, test the water conditions, meet the locals and uncover some of the looming threats salmon could begin to face if this special place isn't protected more carefully. But in such a scarcely populated and unknown part of the world Zeb's mission won't be easy . He seeks the help of a team of world-class kayakers and tackles white water rapids, bears, volcanoes and poachers to find out why this land is home to so many salmon

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Stretching from the North Pole to the tropics, Asia is the largest continent on earth. It is the highest and most populated, and life here is harsh. To survive, the animals that inhabit this continent have evolved into the toughest of the tough

programme.title: Igra lavova
programme.desc: One out of eight lions survives into adulthood, and the males that do enter into a game of kings, as each bloodline fights for its ultimate survival and right to win a pride. Each survivor is the result of hard battles won against hunger, attack by older males, and run-ins with different nomads all trying to win the ultimate prize: life

programme.title: 24 sata u divljini
programme.desc: The Africa savannah crosses 25 countries and is home to millions of animals. Here herbivores and carnivores are caught in a constant struggle for survival. From the apex carnivore, the lion, to the humble meerkat, this film charts 24 hours of life here, through day, night and day again, revealing incredible behaviour driven by the evolutionary clock of time

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Fish biologist Dr. Zeb Hogan travels to one of the world's most wild and remote locations: Kamchatka, in Russia's Far East, a place home to a mass migration of millions of salmon. It's this isolation that created one of the world's last truly wild salmon sanctuaries and with an incredible 14000 of the most remote and pristine rivers on Earth, it's not surprising that this is the perfect salmon habitat. Zeb wants to explore why there are so many salmon here. To do so he will have to find as many species as he can, test the water conditions, meet the locals and uncover some of the looming threats salmon could begin to face if this special place isn't protected more carefully. But in such a scarcely populated and unknown part of the world Zeb's mission won't be easy . He seeks the help of a team of world-class kayakers and tackles white water rapids, bears, volcanoes and poachers to find out why this land is home to so many salmon

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep
programme.desc: Some of Africa's most formidable predators live in family groups. We follow the lives of three of these - lion, wild dog and hyena - as they cross paths in Timbavati, near Kruger. The Timbavati pride is a newly formed coalition of three lion brothers, three lionesses and their newborn cubs. In comparison, the Sohebeles have lost their father and their territory. The 5 youngsters are left to their own devices. We compare the structure of the lions' family group to a pack of wild dogs that visit the Timbavati, and the local hyena clan, lead by a powerful matriarch. All three families work in very different ways with one purpose- survival

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Nothing like a fun day of frolicking at the beach…but venture past the surf and things could get ugly. For this is where nightmares lurk armed with jaws, posion, and unimaginable powers. They say enter at your own risk...but this time, it just happends to be true

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Some you see, and some you don't. But they all have eight legs and a bundle of bulging eyeballs. This is a nightmare of the arachnid kind. So best to look in that shoe before you put it on, because whoever said good things come in small packages, wasn't talking about these guys

programme.title: Igra lavova
programme.desc: One out of eight lions survives into adulthood, and the males that do enter into a game of kings, as each bloodline fights for its ultimate survival and right to win a pride. Each survivor is the result of hard battles won against hunger, attack by older males, and run-ins with different nomads all trying to win the ultimate prize: life

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Kenny and Danny meet with two dog handlers from the Logansport PD. Logansport wants to run their first Drug Interdiction Detail, where officers set up a fake checkpoint to wait for people avoiding the checkpoint on a rarely used road. The handlers invite Kenny and Danny along to supervise the dogs out on the interdiction and make sure everything goes well in a new environment

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Bobby and Danny oversee a new cop class at VLK. These inexperienced police handlers from various departments are paired up with trained police K9s. This allows the officers to catch up to the experience level of the dogs, and strengthen the team as a whole. But one officer isn’t willing to play ball, and Bobby and Danny have to lay down the law

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta: Ralje i grijesi
programme.desc: Some have razor sharp teeth that can slice thick layers of muscle, straight to the bone. Others have jaws that can crush your skull with a single snap. And others are equipped with fangs to squirt neurotoxins directly into your veins

programme.title: Smrtni neprijatelji
programme.desc: In Africa, no other herbivore rivals the buffalo with its brute force and collective strategy; honed over millennia in an evolutionary blood feud with the ultimate predator. For most of the year the breeding herd fends off relentless attacks from the resident lion pride. Then, when the dry season sucks water away from the grasslands, they migrate beyond the reach of the killers, but risk starvation. Life is a perpetual Catch 22 for the buffaloes where payment for fresh water and sweet grasses is made in blood

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: It's a voracious predatory catfish that prowls the rivers of Southeast Asia. Growing up to two meters and weighing over 80 kg, the wallago catfish is a pure carnivore, equipped with formidable jaws and a double band of saw-like teeth, designed to attack

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep
programme.desc: In South Africa's Timbavati region, two leopards try to raise their cubs to the best of their abilities. Over a course of months, the cubs will learn all that their mothers have to teach, such as hunting and how to evade predators. But danger is everywhere, even in your own family, proving that Africa can be as brutal as it is beautiful

programme.title: Igra lavova
programme.desc: One out of eight lions survives into adulthood, and the males that do enter into a game of kings, as each bloodline fights for its ultimate survival and right to win a pride. Each survivor is the result of hard battles won against hunger, attack by older males, and run-ins with different nomads all trying to win the ultimate prize: life

programme.title: 24 sata u divljini
programme.desc: The Africa savannah crosses 25 countries and is home to millions of animals. Here herbivores and carnivores are caught in a constant struggle for survival. From the apex carnivore, the lion, to the humble meerkat, this film charts 24 hours of life here, through day, night and day again, revealing incredible behaviour driven by the evolutionary clock of time

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta: Ralje i grijesi
programme.desc: From gluttonous frogs to lusty seals to angry angry hippos, these beasts exhibit extreme behaviors that make them the most outrageous and dangerous sinners in the animal kingdom

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta: Ralje i grijesi
programme.desc: Some have razor sharp teeth that can slice thick layers of muscle, straight to the bone. Others have jaws that can crush your skull with a single snap. And others are equipped with fangs to squirt neurotoxins directly into your veins

programme.title: Čudesna paukova kuća
programme.desc: Ever wondered what spiders really get up to in your home? In an ambitious experiment, a team of experts fill a normal house full of hundreds and hundreds of spiders, where an astonishing drama unfolds within its walls

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Dr. Zeb Hogan teams up with kayaking expert Trip Jennings and a team of Brazilian scientists to tackle the Rio Roosevelt in western Brazil. They'll battle the river's deadly rapids in an effort to complete a comprehensive survey of one of the Amazon's most remote jungle rivers, and discover what monster fish are lurking beneath the surface of this 400 mile-long river. Pressures like logging and dams are believed to be destroying critical fish habitat throughout the region. His journey is an important look at what might be lost if these pressures reach the pristine Rio Roosevelt

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: The steamy jungles of the Amazon region reverberate with the sound of screeches, growls and grunts. These are the noises of creatures hidden in the trees vying with one another for survival in the forest. 1.Eyelash viper - So called because of the enlarged scales above its eyes, the eyelash viper hangs in the trees

programme.title: Zemlja puma
programme.desc: Deep in the vast American West lies a high, lonely land called the Colorado Plateau. This Living Eden is a vast, wild area, home to an incredible array of creatures that instinctively embody the spirit of the West. From the elusive mountain lion to the resourceful coyote, only the strongest survive in Canyon Country

programme.title: Puma
programme.desc: On the southern tip of South America, across the rugged Patagonia region, is one of the few remaining refuges of the puma. Wildlife filmmaker Hugh Miles follows two years in the life of a female puma and her growing cubs, providing unprecedented coverage of a pumas life in the wild

programme.desc: Oak Island šumovit je otok na južnoj obali Nove Škotske koji već više od dva stoljeća opčinjava lovce na blago

programme.title: U potrazi za Hitlerom
programme.desc: Godine 2014. FBI je objavio mogućnost da je Hitler pobjegao u Južnu Ameriku. Uz povjerljive podatke koji otkrivaju nove tragove, u emisiji "U potrazi za Hitlerom" pokušavaju riješiti zagonetku o smrti najvećeg zločinca svih vremena

programme.desc: U sjajnoj garaži u Kaliforniji Mike poludi za retro brodićem koji mora imati i zaljubi se u BMW-ov mikroautomobil koji bi mogao biti skupocjen

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: U okrugu Cajun Shelby je pronašao golemu zalihu balvana. No do njih može doći samo barkom na vesla i provlačiti se kroz uzak kanal okružen privatnim kućama i dokovima

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: "Holdensi" i "Big Texansi" dolaze pomoći u potrazi za nestalim kamionom koji je prevozio hranu u "Banku hrane" u Houstonu. Budući da bi tom konzerviranom hranom prehranjivali 1500 obitelji cijeli mjesec, pronalazak kamiona glavni im je prioritet

programme.title: Gorštaci
programme.desc: Marty je prisiljen skrenuti zrakoplov s rute i tako potrošiti dragocjeno gorivo, Rich se suočava s najvećim strahom kad su mu psi pobjegli u potjeri za smrtonosnim grabežljivcem, a Kyle svladava zvijer

programme.title: Cjenkanje na obalni način
programme.desc: Tony naiđe na staru staju koju bi trebalo srušiti, ali zanima ga samo predivan stari materijal od kojeg je izrađena. Mogu li on i Codfish odraditi posao i pritom sačuvati sva blaga koja se nalaze unutra

programme.title: Američke restauracije
programme.desc: Jedinstvena električna invalidska kolica sačinjena od dijelova bombardera B-17 iz 1940-ih stižu u radionicu. Hoće li ekipa ostvariti pravi pogodak ovim jednistvenim poslom ili će im minirati restauraciju

programme.title: Američke restauracije
programme.desc: Starinski motorkotač stiže u trgovinu na potpunu restauraciju, zatim navraća zubar s rentgenskim uređajem iz 1920-ih, no Rick se boji da bi moglo biti opasno restaurirati taj uređaj

programme.title: Oživljavanje starih auta
programme.desc: Danny i dečki nalaze se s klijentom koji želi opako lakiranje za opaki "Anglia Dragster" iz 1959. godine. Shannon i Ryan od prenamjenjenog policijskog motocikla za klijenta izrađuju "Harley Davidson Bagger" po narudžbi

programme.title: Oživljavanje starih auta
programme.desc: Kevin i ekipa udružuju se kako bi napravili nešto posebno za Dannyja. Za to vrijeme automobil koji je nekoć pripadao "Kralju" baca Dannyja na koljena

programme.title: Skladišni ratovi

World War II: The Price of Empire

programme.title: Otkrivanje vremena
Time Team

programme.title: Slavna putovanja europskim željeznicama
Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Slijedeći vodič iz 1913., Michael započinje svoje putovanje u Berlinu pa putuje preko živopisnih planina Harz do industrijskog Rurskog područja i otkriva da je carska Njemačka bila spremna za rat

programme.title: Slavna putovanja europskim željeznicama
Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Prateći utabane staze putnika iz ranog 20. stoljeća, Michael na svom putovanju istražuje Švicarsku, čije su željezničke pruge bile omiljene među edvardijanskim turistima

programme.title: Potraga za Aleksandrovim izgubljenim svijetom
Alexander's Lost World
programme.desc: Pridružite se fotografu Davidu Adamsu na 2500 kilometara dugom putu niz srednjoazijsku rijeku Amu-Darju, otkrivajući povijesne korake Aleksandra Velikog

programme.title: Zabranjena povijest
Forbidden History
programme.desc: Jamie putuje u Rumunjsku naoružan češnjakom i raspelom kako bi istražio ima li legenda o vampirima uporište u stvarnosti

programme.title: Zabranjena povijest
Forbidden History
programme.desc: Proročište u Delfiju ima veliki povijesni značaj, ali je još uvijek prekriven velom tajne. Jamie putuje u Grčku kako bi potražio činjenice koje se kriju iza najpoznatijeg proročišta u povijesti

programme.title: Samurajske kraljice ratnice
Samurai Warrior Queens
programme.desc: Akademska istraživanja iskopina japanskih bojišnica potvrđuju da je gotovo 30 % otkrivenih ratnika bilo ženskog spola. Britanski i japanski povjesničari otkrivaju istinu o samurajskim ratnicama

programme.title: Tajne Biblije
Secret Bible
programme.desc: Tisućama godina ljudi žele saznati više o najvećoj priči Staroga zavjeta - egzodusu. Ovo je priča o putovanju sir Colina Humphreysa da pronađe stvarnu rutu egzodusa

programme.title: Lovci na mitove
Myth Hunters

programme.title: Uspon civilizacije
The Ascent of Civilisation
programme.desc: Ova epizoda istražuje kako su Rimljani stvorili jedno od najvećih carstava u povijesti, izgrađeno uz pomoć nevjerojatne vojske profesionalnih legionara i učinkovite političke mašinerije

programme.title: Tajne Biblije
Secret Bible
programme.desc: Povjesničar i spisatelj Adrian Gilbert vjeruje da je dokazao da je legendarni Jakovljev kamen stvaran. Gilbert želi ispitati kamen da bi potvrdio njegovo podrijetlo. No, nitko mu to ne dopušta

programme.title: Zabranjena povijest
Forbidden History
programme.desc: Jamie istražuje krajnje tajanstven red ruže i križa, odnosno rozenkrojcere. To je bio tajanstveni red čiji su članovi bili Leonardo da Vinci, Sir Isaac Newton i Christopher Wren

programme.title: Lovci na Bibliju
Bible Hunters
programme.desc: Ispitat ćemo priče ljudi koji su putovali u Egipat tijekom 19. i 20. stoljeća u potrazi za najstarijim kršćanskim tekstovima. Njihova otkrića bacila su kontroverzno novo svjetlo na Bibliju

programme.title: Tajne Biblije
Secret Bible
programme.desc: Razdvajanje Crvenoga mora jedno je od najvećih čuda Staroga zavjeta. Bivši policajac Bob Cornuke i softverski inženjer Carl Drews odlučili su riješiti tu tajnu

programme.title: Znameniti špijuni
Spymasters
programme.desc: Ovo je priča o dvjema špijunkama, Zofiji Potocka koju je unovačio ruski vojni vođa Potemkin da upravlja špijunskim mrežama u Poljskoj i Mata Hari koja je unovačena kao njemačka agentica

programme.title: Otkriveni Ermitaž
Hermitage Revealed
programme.desc: Emisija vodi publiku na uzbudljivo putovanje kroz povijest muzeja, od carske palače do državnoga muzeja. Pruža pristup bez presedana posebnim zbirkama i ekskluzivnim područjima

programme.title: Uspon i pad Versaillesa: Luj XV

programme.desc: Ovaj film istražuje najskandaloznije godine Versajske palače te pripovijeda priču o Luju XV., jednom od najvećih raskalašenika u povijesti

Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: ‘Cuda iz Paučine! Pogon je instaliran i ekipa je spremna dovršiti posao na ‘Cudi. Gotov auto dolaze vidjeti i neki od glumaca iz hororca „Paučina. (S2, Ep12)

Wicked Inventions

programme.title: Potraga za žadom
Jade Fever
programme.desc: Svi su uzbuđeni jer napokon iskapaju zelene grumene koji bi mogli vrijediti milijune dolara. No kada dođe profesionalni kupac žada, čekaju ih loše vijesti. (S1, Ep8)

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big

programme.title: Tragači za blagom

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings

programme.title: Kraljevi rezbarenja
Carver Kings
programme.desc: Mark primi narudžbu za golemi krevet iako nikad prije nije rezbario krevet. Ryan pokazuje Malom kako se rezbare ledene skulpture u strahovitoj narudžbi. (S1, Ep12)

programme.title: Kraljevi rezbarenja

programme.title: Kraljevi rezbarenja
Carver Kings
programme.desc: Pioneerovoj radionici prijeti snježna oluja i Ryan se žuri kako bi dovršio bar u polinezijskom stilu, a Mark i Pete hvataju se ukoštac s najneobičnijom rezbarijom u njihovoj karijeri. (S1, Ep14)

programme.title: Tragači za blagom

programme.title: Vulkanske odiseje
Volcanic Odysseys

programme.title: Vulkanske odiseje

programme.title: Rođeni u divljini

programme.title: Planet Europa i dalje
Planet Europe and Beyond

programme.title: Hollywood Express
programme.category: Emisija o filmu. Aktuelni novi filmovi, glavni glumci, režiseri, intervjui, Red carpet, premijere i kratki pregledi aktualnih filmova.

programme.title: Moj život - SATNE
programme.desc: Imamo rijedak uvid u živote pripadnika jednog maorskog plemena, koji se bore za zaštitu kulturne baštine. Prema njihovom vjerovanju, pleme Whanganui preuzelo je ime, duh i snagu od velike rijeke koja teče s planina u centralnom dijelu sjevernog novozelandskog otoka prema moru

programme.title: Tragom Putinove Rusije
programme.desc: Vladimir Putin, predsjednik koji suverno vlada Rusijom, slovi za najmoćnijeg čovjeka u toj zemlji i za jednog od najutjecajnih političara na planeti. U četiri dijela serijala, donosimo priče iz te zemlje, gdje smo se na mjestu događaja uvjerili u moć Putinove Rusije. Razgovarali smo s mnogim Rusima i postavljali pitanje zašto većina voli Putina, glasa za njega i šta zapravo stanovnici žele za sebe i svoju zemlju, te kakva je uloga Putina u tome? U drugom dijelu serijala istražujemo kako ekonomska kriza potresa Rusiju? Kako se građani Rusije snalaze u novonastaloj situaciji, ko je odgovoran za ekonomsku krizu i pad vrijednosti rublje? Je li za to odgovoran Zapad, zbog uvođenja sankcija Rusiji kao posljedice njene uloge u sukobu u Ukrajini? Treba li odgovornost tražiti u padu cijena nafte na globalnom svjetskom tržištu, korupciji ili zaostavštini komunističke privrede

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: Optužbe za blasfemiju imaju kobne posljedice u Pakistanu, no neki riskiraju svoje živote kako bi izvršili pritiske na pravosudne organe da reformišu taj zakon. U Pakistanu je protivzakonito davati pogrdne komentare o poslaniku Muhamedu ili oskrnaviti Kur'an. Često se dešava da se ljudi zatvaraju samo na osnovu izjava svjedoka, bez bilo kakvog konkretnog dokaza. Nažalost, u dosta slučajeva lokalno stanovništvo uzima pravdu u svoje ruke, kamenujući ljude koji su optuženi za blesfemiju

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Kako se osjeća rođeni Argentinac koji je živio u Čileu, a naših je korijena, ili rođena Sarajka koja se nakon Amerike, Francuske i Njemačke skrasila u Zagrebu? Gdje im je dom, koji je njihov nacionalni identitet? Na ova pitanja odgovaraju ESTEBAN STEVAN MILOVIĆ i TATJANA GALIĆ. Stevan je rođen u Argentini. Roditelji su mu iz Bosne i Hercegovine i Hrvatske. Dolazeći s porodicom preko ljeta, odlučio je ostati u Trebinju jer je tu pronašao svoj mir, ali i posao. On je, naime, jedan od najvećih uzgajivača jabuka i trešanja na ovom području, od čega izdržava svoje sedmero djece. Tatjana je doktor nauka iz oblasti mikrobiologije koja je u Zagrebu pokrenula ordinaciju za biorezonancu kojom pomaže brojnim ljudima da dovedu svoj organizam u prirodni balans. Oni nam govore o svom poimanju vlastitog identiteta i specifičnim kvalitetima života u Zagrebu i Trebinju

programme.title: Regioskop - Presuda u Mađarskoj
programme.desc: Filmska ekipa je tri godine pratila suđenje članovima mađarske kriminalne bande, optuženim za rasno motivisana ubistva šest Roma, uključujući i djecu. Policiji je trebalo više od godinu da uhapsi osumnjičene, a cijeli slučaj je predugo trajao - uglavnom zbog nedostatka dokaza i ogromnih policijskih propusta

programme.title: Čuvari tajni
programme.desc: Bivši šefovi izraelske agencije za unutrašnju sigurnost, poznate kao Shin Bet, prvi put se javno osvrću na svoje postupke i odluke te iznose svoje viđenje situacije. Od Šestodnevnog rata iz 1967. godine Izrael nije postigao uspjeh u preobrazbi razarajuće vojne pobjede u trajni mir. Tokom cijelog tog perioda ovi šefovi Shin Beta nalazili su se u samom centru procesa donošenja odluka u vezi sa pitanjima koja se tiču sigurnosti. Usko su sarađivali sa svim izraelskim premijerima. Njihove procjene i shvatanja su imali, a i dalje imaju, veliki utjecaj na izraelsku politiku. U razgovoru rasvjetljavaju kontroverzu u vezi sa okupacijom u periodu nakon Šestodnevnog rata

programme.title: Širom svijeta
programme.desc: Metode u istragama koje koriste izraelske unutrašnje sigurnosne službe u najmanju ruku su kontroverzne. Izraelska unutrašnja služba sigurnosti Shin Bet, ili Shabak, jedna je od tri glavne službe sigurnosnog aparata. Kroz lične ispovijesti dva bivša Shin Bet pritvorenika, Al Jazeera World ispituje kontroverzne organizacijske metode, ovlasti i historiju te službe

programme.title: Reprint Čede Kapora
programme.desc: Godine 1938. u Barceloni mladi interbrigadist i antifašist Čedo Kapor ušetao je u štamparski kolektiv i ugledao knjigu. Želio ju je kupiti po svaku cijenu, ali nije imao konzervu mesa koliko je koštala. Nakon što je sutradan saznao da je posljednji primjerak prodan, počeo je potragu! Sudbina Čede Kapora i knjige ukrsitit će se i neraskidivo vezati, a ubrzo kreću na opasno, neizvjesno, ali i uzbudljivo putovanje

programme.title: Moj život
programme.desc: Pratimo ambicioznu tinejdžerku Suzete Sangula koja se bori za prava žena u Mozambiku

programme.title: Tragom Putinove Rusije
programme.desc: Vladimir Putin, ruski predsjednik koji suverno vlada Rusijom, slovi kao najmoćniji čovjek ove zemlje i kao jedan od najutjecajnijih političara na planeti. U četri dijela ovoga serijala bili smo u Rusiji, gdje smo se na licu mjesta uvjerili u moć Putinove Rusije. Razgovarali smo s mnogim Rusima i postavljajali pitanje zašto većina Rusa voli Putina, glasa za njega i šta, zapravo, stanovnici Rusije žele za sebe i svoju zemlju, te kakva je uloga Putina u tome. U trećem dijelu serijala Tragom Putinove Rusije autor filma istražuje zašto i na koji način ruski predsjednik 25 godina nakon hladnog rata ponovno poziconira Rusiju kao globalnu vojnu silu, razvitak novog nauružanja, ali i indirektno ili aktivno učešće snaga Vojske Rusije u sukobima na istoku Ukarjine, aneksiji Krima ili ratu u Siriji. Istražuje se i kakva je uloga ruske pravoslavne crkve i njene podrške aktuelnoj vlasti, kakav je odnos s drugim vjerskim zajednicama. Naš reporter je bio u posjeti Dagestanu, gdje je razgovarao sa stanovnicima ove republike i o položaju tamošnjih muslimana

programme.title: Moj život
programme.desc: Pratimo ambicioznu tinejdžerku Suzete Sangula koja se bori za prava žena u Mozambiku

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: U ovosedmičnom izdanju serijala 'Priče s istoka' putujemo u Kinu gdje istražujemo tradiciju u vezi sa odgajanjem djece i običaj da mlade majke ostaju u kući mjesec dana nakon rođenja djeteta. Naša reporterka boravi s majkama nakon poroda i upoznaje se s tim drevnim kineskim običajem

programme.title: Vrhovi Balkana
programme.desc: Ono što je Grcima Olimp, Bugarima Rila, Hrvatima Velebit, Slovencima Triglav, to je Makedoncima Šar planina. U samoj Makedoniji ona je po mnogo čemu kultna. Istražili smo sve o šarplanincu - mitskom psu, koji je dobio ime po planini sa čijih obronaka vodi porijeklo. Zna li šarplaninac brojati i u čemu je tajna činjenice da ovi psi prepoznaju pojedinačno svaku od više stotina ovaca, otkriva nam profesor Muhić. Na Šar planini ima mnogo jezera, još više vrhova iznad 2000 metara nadmorske visine, prostranih pašnjaka... Sve ovo pokriva 1600 kilometara kvadratnih, čime je treća planina po površini na Balkanu. Šar planina je duga 80, a široka blizu 30 kilometara.Na vrh se penjemo sa Ilinom Arsovom, prvom i za sada jedinom Makedonkom koja se popela na Mount Everest i time ušla u historiju tamošnjeg planinarstva. Ilina nam otkriva tajne Šar planine i zašto se baš ovdje pripremala za uspon na Mount Everest(c)

programme.title: Vrhovi Balkana
programme.desc: Ono što je Grcima Olimp, Bugarima Rila, Hrvatima Velebit, Slovencima Triglav, to je Makedoncima Šar planina. U samoj Makedoniji ona je po mnogo čemu kultna. programme.title: Ljudi i moć
programme.desc: Gledamo iza kulisa kolumbijskih pobunjenika, dok se bliži kraj 50. godine sukoba

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Primorje i planinski predjeli spajaju se u ovoj epizodi u kojoj čujemo priče Crnogorca profesora IVANA L. ZUBERA i Slovenca JURE FRANKA. Obojica vrhunski sportaši govore kako je bilo živjeti u Italiji gdje je gospodin Zuber trenirao plivače velike Rome ili u Japanu u kojem je skijaš i osvajač olimpijskog srebra Franko dugo godina radio kao glasnogovornik. Govore nam o tome koliko su njihove zemlje imale pozitivnog ili negativnog utjecaja na njihov povratak, a sve to vodeći nas kroz sunčane predjele Herceg-Novog ili kroz šarmantnu jezgru slovenskog gradića Radovljice

Dolazeći s porodicom preko ljeta, odlučio je ostati u Trebinju jer je tu pronašao svoj mir, ali i posao. On je, naime, jedan od najvećih uzgajivača jabuka i trešanja na ovom području, od čega izdržava svoje sedmero djece. Tatjana je doktor nauka iz oblasti mikrobiologije koja je u Zagrebu pokrenula ordinaciju za biorezonancu kojom pomaže brojnim ljudima da dovedu svoj organizam u prirodni balans. Oni nam govore o svom poimanju vlastitog identiteta i specifičnim kvalitetima života u Zagrebu i Trebinju

programme.title: Lica Kine
programme.desc: Planine Qinling protežu se na više od 1500 kilometara u kineskoj provinciji Shaanxi. Razdvajaju sjever i jug zemlje. Mnoga sela u regiji, koja se smatraju kolijevkom kineske civilizacije, nalaze se na velikoj nadmorskoj visini, a neka i na više od 3000 metara. U toj planinskoj regiji pratimo tim državnih službenika koji putuju na motorima u pokušaju da se i u tim udaljenim planinskim zajednicama riješe nagomilani problemi u skladu sa zakonom

programme.title: Širom svijeta
programme.desc: U poređenju s drugim telekomunikacijskim tehnologijama, sateliti su najsigurniji. Broj zahtjeva za korištenjem usluga vještačkih satelita u ogromnom je porastu. Danas je bez njih nemoguće zamisliti život. Njihov nestanak značio bi i obustavljanje međunarodnih razgovora, prestanak rada satelitskih TV kanala, kao i telekomunikacijskog sektora. U saobraćaju bismo se odrekli prednosti Globalnog sistema za pozicioniranje. Međutim, u primjeni te tehnologije postoje vlade pojedinih zemalja koje ometanjem satelitskog signala žele uvesti cenzuru. U današnjem svijetu sistem telekomunikacija i satelitskog prijenosa signala u stalnom je porastu. Kako i na koji način se ta tehnologija razvijala, saznat ćemo u novom izdanju serijala ' Širom svijeta'

programme.title: Lica Kine
programme.desc: Planine Qinling protežu se na više od 1500 kilometara u kineskoj provinciji Shaanxi. Razdvajaju sjever i jug zemlje. Mnoga sela u regiji, koja se smatraju kolijevkom kineske civilizacije, nalaze se na velikoj nadmorskoj visini, a neka i na više od 3000 metara. U toj planinskoj regiji pratimo tim državnih službenika koji putuju na motorima u pokušaju da se i u tim udaljenim planinskim zajednicama riješe nagomilani problemi u skladu sa zakonom

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: Optužbe za blasfemiju imaju kobne posljedice u Pakistanu, no neki riskiraju svoje živote kako bi izvršili pritiske na pravosudne organe da reformišu taj zakon. U Pakistanu je protivzakonito davati pogrdne komentare o poslaniku Muhamedu ili oskrnaviti Kur'an. Često se dešava da se ljudi zatvaraju samo na osnovu izjava svjedoka, bez bilo kakvog konkretnog dokaza. Nažalost, u dosta slučajeva lokalno stanovništvo uzima pravdu u svoje ruke, kamenujući ljude koji su optuženi za blesfemiju

programme.title: Većina počinje ovdje
programme.desc: Film prati šest mladih ljudi iz bivših jugoslovenskih republika dok putujući regionom istražuju uticaj ratova s kraja prošlog vijeka na njihove živote i budućnost

programme.title: Reprint Čede Kapora
programme.desc: Godine 1938. u Barceloni mladi interbrigadist i antifašist Čedo Kapor ušetao je u štamparski kolektiv i ugledao knjigu. Želio ju je kupiti po svaku cijenu, ali nije imao konzervu mesa koliko je koštala. Nakon što je sutradan saznao da je posljednji primjerak prodan, počeo je potragu! Sudbina Čede Kapora i knjige ukrsitit će se i neraskidivo vezati, a ubrzo kreću na opasno, neizvjesno, ali i uzbudljivo putovanje

programme.title: Regioskop - Presuda u Mađarskoj
programme.desc: Filmska ekipa je tri godine pratila suđenje članovima mađarske kriminalne bande, optuženim za rasno motivisana ubistva šest Roma, uključujući i djecu. Policiji je trebalo više od godinu da uhapsi osumnjičene, a cijeli slučaj je predugo trajao - uglavnom zbog nedostatka dokaza i ogromnih policijskih propusta

programme.title: Vrhovi Balkana
programme.desc: Ono što je Grcima Olimp, Bugarima Rila, Hrvatima Velebit, Slovencima Triglav, to je Makedoncima Šar planina. U samoj Makedoniji ona je po mnogo čemu kultna. Istražili smo sve o šarplanincu - mitskom psu, koji je dobio ime po planini sa čijih obronaka vodi porijeklo. Zna li šarplaninac brojati i u čemu je tajna činjenice da ovi psi prepoznaju pojedinačno svaku od više stotina ovaca, otkriva nam profesor Muhić. Na Šar planini ima mnogo jezera, još više vrhova iznad 2000 metara nadmorske visine, prostranih pašnjaka... Sve ovo pokriva 1600 kilometara kvadratnih, čime je treća planina po površini na Balkanu. Šar planina je duga 80, a široka blizu 30 kilometara.Na vrh se penjemo sa Ilinom Arsovom, prvom i za sada jedinom Makedonkom koja se popela na Mount Everest i time ušla u historiju tamošnjeg planinarstva. Ilina nam otkriva tajne Šar planine i zašto se baš ovdje pripremala za uspon na Mount Everest(c)

programme.title: Moj život
programme.desc: Pratimo ambicioznu tinejdžerku Suzete Sangula koja se bori za prava žena u Mozambiku

programme.title: Nedjelja 13.
programme.desc: Dokumentarni film «Nedjelja 13.» se bavi događajima na nikada odigranoj utakmici Dinamo - Crvena Zvezda prije tačno 25 godina, 13. maja 1990. godine. Prikazali smo šta se događalo na maksimirskom stadionu, ali i van njega uoči početka utakmice. Svoje poglede i sjećanja vezano za ovaj događaj iznose mjerodavne osobe - navijači s obje strane (Dinamovi i navijači Crvene Zvezde), službenici (pripadnici tadašnjih milicijskih jedinica, voditelji osiguranja same utakmice, predstavnici klubova), ali i igrači obje momčadi. Namjera filma je predstaviti svjedočanstva učesnika događaja, od kojih većina, bar do danas, javnosti nije poznata

programme.title: Tragom Putinove Rusije
programme.desc: Vladimir Putin, ruski predsjednik koji suverno vlada Rusijom, slovi kao najmoćniji čovjek ove zemlje i kao jedan od najutjecajnijih političara na planeti. U četri dijela ovoga serijala bili smo u Rusiji, gdje smo se na licu mjesta uvjerili u moć Putinove Rusije. Razgovarali smo s mnogim Rusima i postavljajali pitanje zašto većina Rusa voli Putina, glasa za njega i šta, zapravo, stanovnici Rusije žele za sebe i svoju zemlju, te kakva je uloga Putina u tome. U trećem dijelu serijala Tragom Putinove Rusije autor filma istražuje zašto i na koji način ruski predsjednik 25 godina nakon hladnog rata ponovno poziconira Rusiju kao globalnu vojnu silu, razvitak novog nauružanja, ali i indirektno ili aktivno učešće snaga Vojske Rusije u sukobima na istoku Ukarjine, aneksiji Krima ili ratu u Siriji. Istražuje se i kakva je uloga ruske pravoslavne crkve i njene podrške aktuelnoj vlasti, kakav je odnos s drugim vjerskim zajednicama. Naš reporter je bio u posjeti Dagestanu, gdje je razgovarao sa stanovnicima ove republike i o položaju tamošnjih muslimana

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: U ovosedmičnom izdanju serijala 'Priče s istoka' putujemo u Kinu gdje istražujemo tradiciju u vezi sa odgajanjem djece i običaj da mlade majke ostaju u kući mjesec dana nakon rođenja djeteta. Naša reporterka boravi s majkama nakon poroda i upoznaje se s tim drevnim kineskim običajem

programme.title: Ljudi i moć
programme.desc: Gledamo iza kulisa kolumbijskih pobunjenika, dok se bliži kraj 50. godine sukoba

programme.title: Širom svijeta
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi serijala "Širom svijeta" putujemo u Tursku, gdje istažujemo glamurozni svijet mode pokrivenih muslimanki i otkrivamo kakve je društvene promjene donio Turskoj. Poslije uspostave Republike Turske 1923. godine, muslimanke u Turskoj su bile ograničene zabranama vezano za odijevanje po islamskim propisima. Međutim, usponom AK partije i njihovim dolaskom na vlast, mnoge žene u Turskoj ponovno bez bojazni mogu nositi hidžab

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: U ovosedmičnom izdanju serijala 'Priče s istoka' putujemo u Kinu gdje istražujemo tradiciju u vezi sa odgajanjem djece i običaj da mlade majke ostaju u kući mjesec dana nakon rođenja djeteta. programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: ENES KAHRIMANOVIĆ i NESTOR SLEPČEV napustili su svoje rodne gradove nevoljko, još u mladosti, u potrazi za boljom i sigurnijom egzistencijom. Trudom i radom cijeli su život tražili svoje mjesto pod suncem i nalaze ga, nakon mnogo lutanja, ipak u svom zavičaju. Enes je nakon brojnih poslova na Zapadu, svojom ambicijom, ali i dovitljivošću, uspio u rodni Kozarac dovesti veliku austrijsku firmu, otvoriti fabriku i zaposliti pedesetak ljudi, te tako od vozača viljuškara u Austriji postati jedan od najuspješnijih menadžera u BIH. Nestor je, pak, kao avioinženjer izgradio uspješnu karijeru vani, ali je nostalgija bila prejaka te se odlučio vratiti u Vojvodinu i početi ispočetka, ali na svom. Danas je vlasnik etno sela u kojem se i dalje bavi konstrukcijom aviona iz Drugog svjetskog rata i pravljenjenjem fijakera. Oni govore o uređenim sistemima "tamo" i o neuređenosti "ovdje" i svojim pokušajima i načinima da se njihova mjesta urede po zapadnim principima, ali da ne izgube ono zbog čega su se u njih i vratili. Nama već poznati internacionalni ambasadori i ovdje daju svoj osvrt, precizno detektirajući prednosti i mane ovdašnjih društveno-političkih sistema
